recommendations: Luvkesh Chhabra “Aditya is a self starter and a go-getter. This has been his trait since our induction days into Citibank together. By always challenging the usual, he has exelled in implementing innovative distribution channels. Recognition for his work in Citi for the last more than two years is substantiated by feats like 'Champions forum'. His clarity of thought and undeterring self confidence is truly inspiring. I did have a lot to learn from him for the 14 months we worked in the same business unit.”
